title: The Kids’ Corner
description: The couple want a peaceful top table and a chaotic kids’ corner. Keep the little ones away from the microphones.
clues: Nadia and Sara sit together in the middle of the top table.
Each bride’s mum insists on sitting next to her own daughter.
No children are allowed at the top table during the speeches.
The kids’ table is completely filled with Leo, Mia, Oscar, and Ella.
Leo insists on being first to get cake at the kids’ table, and Ella always drifts to the very end.
hints: If each mum must sit next to her own daughter and the couple sit together in the middle, the mums must go on the outside.
The kids simply fill all four seats at the kids’ table in order from Leo to Ella.
There should be no empty seats in this puzzle.
